text: The Orphanage () is a 2007 Spanish Mexican horror movie directed by first time director J. A. Bayona and starring Belén Rueda, Fernando Cayo, Roger Príncep, Montserrat Carulla, Geraldine Chaplin, Mabel Rivera, Andrés Gertrúdix, Edgar Vivar. It won 7 Goya Awards in 2008. == Other websites == * * * Category:2007 horror movies Category:2000s supernatural movies Category:Spanish horror movies Category:Mexican horror movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Movies directed by J. A. Bayona
title: The Orphanage (movie)
